commandIp: To join the minecraft server, join the discord (kahlifar.de/discord) server. Then use the "/application Minecraft" command. The IP is: kahlifar.de
commandInfo: Kahlifar is a Community. We have a Minecraft and a Discord Server. For more information, visit kahlifar.de or join the Discord Server (kahlifar.de/discord).
commandHelp: To get more information about a command, use "/help <command>". With /info you can get more information about Kahlifar.
commandSocials: Website: kahlifar.de • Discord: kahlifar.de/discord • YouTube: kahlifar.de/youtube
